website_summaries.verdict: A well-made UV protection shirt that fits snugly and helps to keep you cool and dry.
pros: Fits well and is comfortable against your skin
cons: There have been some complaints of it stretching out over time

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable coverage for this plus-size mom
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use over the summer, as I am very fair-skinned and we have passes to our local water park. Received it today and tried it on. I typically wear a women’s XL, or 2XL if it is a “fitted” item. I ordered a 2XL as the description suggests ordering slightly larger for a more relaxed fit. I like the fit, but I also had a “swim bra” and high-waisted swim bottom on. For ladies worried because they are large-chested, I felt plenty accommodated (38G-40F). If I buy an additional rash guard, I may try an XL and see which I prefer. I will update after I try it in the water.
customer_reviews.author: cgraves531

customer_reviews.title: Great Shirt For Outdoors
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely my favorite shirt for swimming and outdoor activities. I'm 5'4", 140 lbs, 38D and ordered a large. It fits like a glove. These shirts are amazing how they keep you cool. I ordered more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Flora

customer_reviews.title: I'm really happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this purchase, the top fit well ( I ordered a Large; 5'6", 145 lbs, 32D bust) and offered great sun protection. I burn very easily and wore this all day for a river excursion and had no sign of sun damage on my upper body. I would love to see an expanded color range, a medium gray or a royal purple would be cool.
customer_reviews.author: frances

customer_reviews.title: I loved it! It protected me from the intense sun
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know if this shirt would be too warm, as I purchased it to wear on a kayaking trip on a river which runs through a desert in Utah. I loved it! It protected me from the intense sun, but was cooler than wearing a regular t-shirt. It dried really quickly. I wore either a bathing suit top under it, or a sports bra, and both worked well. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE!! Just purchased 2 more!?
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much, I am purchasing 2 more to make sure I have them available!! I did purchase 2 sizes larger than my normal size. They do have long arms- I will be putting Thumb holes in them for better hand coverage!!
customer_reviews.author: Clarice

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful company and product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Long Sleeve Swim Shirt, but when it arrived the Short Sleeve was sent in error. I reached out to Sun and Surf Store/Goddess Rash Guards to help rectify the error. They were easy to work with and they offered to send the correct shirt and told me to keep the Short Shirt variety as well. The correct Swim Shirt arrived today and it fits me perfectly! I am excited to use it soon when we vacation in the Caribbean in a few weeks. I plan to do a 2nd review after using it! Thank you Sun and Surf and Goddess Rash Guards!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel E.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, cool when wet, breathes well and protected my sensitive (burns easy) skin
customer_reviews.text: I paid attention to the sizing recommendations and ordered XL when normally I'm a medium because I wanted it to be loose. It's incredibly comfortable and it protected me from the hot Texas sun today for 2+ hours at a water park. I bought this after nearly five hours at that park on a previous date where I earned a scorching sunburn despite copious amounts of sunblock. This was a terrific buy.
customer_reviews.author: AustinTX

customer_reviews.title: Outlasts Others...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Goddess Rash Guard shirt that I have purchased. I am in the pool three times a week for two hours at a time. It outlasts and holds up much longer than other brands that I have purchased. The fabric is much better than others. I just hope they don't change manufacturers!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Satterly

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I purchase a small in this, and it was a perfect it. I'm 5'9, 34d, around 155lb, I liked it so much, that I purchase another one! I have had them a few years now and they are still holding up strong!
customer_reviews.author: Taunchie

customer_reviews.title: It will prevent sunburn!
customer_reviews.text: Well made product and it does keep the sun off. It is well constructed with strong seams and excellent, quick drying fabric. I did not give it five stars because I would like it to be a couple inches longer in the body for modesty reasons. I am 64 years old and have used it for hiking, bicycling and kayaking. It actually seems to make the sun less hot!
customer_reviews.author: Mary G.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order a larger size.
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a well made shirt, despite strips of fabric that have been coming loose. Remnants from the manufacturing. The reviews that say order a size or two up I think are misleading. I ordered one size up and it’s way too big, ballooning up around me while I’m in the water. It runs large so I’d suggest stay with your usual size and it will be plenty relaxed.
customer_reviews.author: Texanne

customer_reviews.title: well-made, substantial
customer_reviews.text: Not all rash guard shirts are alike. This one is substantial and well made. The fabric is thicker than other brands. The shirt is a life saver when you have to spend hours in the pool teaching. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MJaremko

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret buying this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. She has very, very fair skin and gets SPF 100+ sun screen and sometimes still tends to get sunburnt. She fit into this perfectly. We took a week long cruise and she had no problems with sunburn. This is going to save us money on sunscreen for sure. She had no problems swimming with this on, or washing it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great sun blocker.
customer_reviews.text: Wore this on vacation in Hawaii, was a great timesaver in not having to apply so much sunscreen, and better for the fish (keeping sunscreen off the reefs or something). :) Wasn't uncomfortable when it was wet or dry. I was worried it would be scratchy or uncomfortable when wet or would swish around my torso while I swam but I didn't have any issues. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Diemer

customer_reviews.title: but started wearing it to run in the winter and it is a wonderful outdoor running shirt for cold temps
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear in the water, but started wearing it to run in the winter and it is a wonderful outdoor running shirt for cold temps. I run early in the morning when the temperatures are about 32 and use this as a base layer. Keeps me toasty without overheating. I am visiting Amazon tonight to purchase another one. Love that it is made in the US and that it is not covered in a brand name. My only wish is that it would come in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: So soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wore this shirt for my entire week long camping trip it was so comfortable. I want my whole closet to be filled with this material. The sun protection was almost perfect. I have a sun allergy so i am extremely sensitive. This shirt would be perfect protection for a normal person or someone only slightly sensitive to the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Fits skin tight so I had to order a large so it was comfortable. I wear a small and medium was still ...
customer_reviews.text: I am buying my third. Fits skin tight so I had to order a large so it was comfortable. I wear a small and medium was still skin tight...Like putting on tights. Large was perfect for me. More comfortable and easier to get on and off. I wear for paddle boarding, kayaking, swimming, horseback riding, golfing, gardening and anytime I plan on being in the sun. Saves money on sunscreen. The quality and price are great. Usually these run $50 plus for cheaper quality. Love this shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Persia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Cool styling. I love it. Order one size larger than you are in an everyday shirt; will still fit snug and will be perfect for in the water. If you want it Loose order two sizes up. Great product. Great styling.
customer_reviews.author: T. M.

customer_reviews.title: Not well-Made in America
customer_reviews.text: I've used this shirt for 3 weeks now, and I am disappointed in the quality. Not only did it bleed color for over a week of rinsing after swimming, the stitching on the cuff is coming out. I really want to support MADE IN AMERICA, but I expect it to be at least as well made as clothing from other countries. I used another shirt made outside the US during the same period, and I've had no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: AHS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Bought this for paddle boarding and kayaking in the summer as I burn easily. This kept my skin protected and cool. Also love that it's made in the USA. These are supposed to fit on the tight side. I am 5'6 and a between a size 4 - 6; the medium fit very well. Not skin tight, but not loose.
customer_reviews.author: Kira87

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The material is thicker than most of the ones sold at stores. Size small fits me well with some extra room. I'm 5'2 and 113lbs. I'd have to get size xs if I want skin tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Yellow Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Not comforable on me
customer_reviews.text: Ordered up a size yet it is still too small. I feel very constricted in this shirt and therefore do not wear it. The neck is too tight and the fabric is thick and stiff. I would prefer a looser fit and thinner fabric with a crew neck. Ordered XL - I'm 5' 4" 160lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Ash 789

customer_reviews.title: Loved the quality
customer_reviews.text: Loved the quality! I usually wear M or L but order XL because of what I read that I needed to order 2 bigger sizes. But ot is anlittle too big for me in the chest area. I am keeping it anyway.. next time I would try a L size.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Gomez

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Love this shirt Nice and form fitting yet comfortable. Holds its shape with right amount of spandex. Also it gives me a sense of protection from UV sun rays when running. Great value for such a nice shirt
customer_reviews.author: cara-run

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rash Guard
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely shirt. I haven't had a chance to wear it yet, but I love the fit. Especially the higher collar. The fabric is a lot heavier weight than I had hoped for travel weight. Maybe I'll be glad when it keeps me warmer in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Lauriemac

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable alternative.
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they fit great and are great quality material. I recommend for anyone looking for an affordable alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Amerilys

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA!
customer_reviews.text: Love that these are made in the USA!! I am a petite, 5'1" 110 pounds, with a short torso. I ordered a medium. It fits just right. I think the small would have been too tight. It is long enough to cover my torso. The collar lays flat, unlike some of the pictures in other reviews. Maybe they changed the design. Over all, great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: According to other reviews I bought a medium. It was too tight so returned for a large. Fits perfect without being too tight. However, once we arrived in BVI's we found rashguard shirts of a lighter weight material. We wore the other shirts daily as the material on this rash guard was too hot. Would be perfect for colder water.
customer_reviews.author: Value Girl

customer_reviews.title: Feels like second skin. Like seal skin.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my wife. She loves it! Tight fit. Blocks sun rays. We are Carolina Tarheel fans. So we love the color. And since we live in NE Florida it keeps the no see ems off our arms. Yes I said our. Ordered one originally for her. We ordered a second one for me. Y'all don't have a men's in Carolina Blue. We do a lot of fishing. And they feel great on the water. And we match. We are happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: The fabric is very nice and it has good stretch strength/tension
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is very nice and it has good stretch strength/tension. This is a well made garment that should last many swimming seasons. I bought it for a vacation so I have not yet worn it but I was very impressed trying it on for fit. Given the tight fit described by reviews I bought a size larger than normal and that was better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G. Baril

customer_reviews.title: Swim shirt
customer_reviews.text: Was much smaller than an XL (I know lol, right) but seriously it was. Material was very stiff but I assume that it will last longer because of this...
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: My Goddess Loves Here
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife for a recently completed vacation in the Caribbean. She wanted something to provide her with some sun protection, a little buoyancy, and a bit of extra warmth. This Rash Guard fit in the bill on all three counts. She went up one size, which was just perfect for her. She likes the shirt and looks damn good in it, besides. The price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Carnac767

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: The shirt itself is ok, but the dye ran. Fortunately I had tossed it in with an old towel so no great loss. This isn't as nice as a couple of other rash guards I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Justeliisfine

customer_reviews.title: Great protection from the elements.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shirt. I bought it to wear under my swimsuit to cover up my arms during summer activities to prevent sunburn. It did that amazingly without causing extra heat. It was comfortable to wear all day. I wore it just about all day every day for a week and it held up just fine. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Tindell

customer_reviews.title: Very cool and soft.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 131 lb. size 8 and the Large fits a little loose, like the picture. It's not skin tight. It feels very cool when I wear it, even out in the sun. I haven't tried it out in the water yet, but I'm going to wear it when I swim with the dolphins next week in Mexico! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Katie Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I can swim daily
customer_reviews.text: I bought a rash guard shirt because I have skin that does not do well in sun. I bought one that would be loose. I love it. I can swim daily, as I live in Arizona, and do not have to put sunscreen on my chest and back. Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Size M-White. Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a size M in WHITE. I am 5'3 with a bust of 32D and I have pretty wide shoulders. My waist size is a 5. This size works for me, I swam laps in the pool and it felt comfortable. The swim suit I wore underneath the rash guard was maroon-colored and there was very minimal see-through. The neck is not turtle-neck is that is what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: Runs very small. I ordered a large and usually wear a medium. I don't think I will be able to get this on over my bathing suit.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: This rash guard is wonderful! Fits very comfortably
customer_reviews.text: This rash guard is wonderful! Fits very comfortably, is very lightweight, I love it! I honestly thought it was too thin to keep the sun at bay but it does its job and feels great! You will be pleased :-)
customer_reviews.author: Patarisha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Perfect for playing with my kids in the pool. Not too tight, not too loose...comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Litter

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for more in a top quality rumming top!
customer_reviews.text: Best running top ever! Great material. Warm without containing sweat. Quick drying and perfect supportive compression. True to size. Will be ordering more now that the weather is cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I took this rash gaurd on a 2 wk scuba diving trip. It was my favorite for fit and comfort and material and size. I am a 34-36 C and the large fit just right. It was the perfect length to go with my Octopusink leggins.
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: haven't actually worn it to swim yet but i like what i see so far. colors are true and fabric as expected, seams seem sturdy. i usually take a medium shirt but ordered a L based on online reviews and the fit is good. snug body as it should be, sleeves a bit long but I have short arms so no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it seems great!
customer_reviews.text: It runs small so order a size up. Other than that it seems great!
customer_reviews.author: susu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little form-fitting, order a size up. Holds up to wear well, may order more.
customer_reviews.author: Makenna Caskey

customer_reviews.title: Great for Deep Water Aerobics
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to keep my shoulders warm while doing deep water aerobics in a cool water pool. This Rash Guard is light weight and does the trick! I will also use it for protection on a future cruise where I will be in the sun and burn easily.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit. Runs small. Fabric feels great
customer_reviews.text: Liked the fit and feel. Haven tried in sun yet, but I hope it protects well. Runs small because fitted. I ordered 2 sizes larger than I usually wear because I wanted a little moving room
customer_reviews.author: Tina Binish

customer_reviews.title: Works!!
customer_reviews.text: Very thick. Never gotten a sun burn but when wet it feels like a rubber band
customer_reviews.author: Debra E Snell

customer_reviews.title: A bit small.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be a nice product, but it was too small. I returned it. I usually wear a large. I bought an extra large but just felt it was too tight. Part of this is just personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry D.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit!!! I ordered one size up and it's great - not too loose, but not skin tight (which I did not want).
customer_reviews.author: LauraS

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality item. Wore it while kayaking. I'll also wear it for swimming as sun protection (instead of needing to apply sunscreen to upper body). Quality is as good as other brands costing much more. And the sizing chart is correct for women's (not juniors) sizes. Love the color too
customer_reviews.author: Linda W

customer_reviews.title: Not super tight!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the rash guard is very good but the sizing is terrible. I’m normally an xs/s but the description said that it runs very tight so I bought a medium. It’s very big but guessing comfortable in the water. I’m used to wearing tops better fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Hilda Orama

customer_reviews.title: I like how the shirt sleeves are long enough so that ...
customer_reviews.text: I like how the shirt sleeves are long enough so that they cover my hands, which is not always the case since I have long arms ( I ordered a large & normally wear a size 10). I also like how it fits snugly, but isn't difficult to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size and soft
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size, I got a large (34DD), fits well without excess fabric. Soft and comfortable dry. I haven't worn it swimming yet but it seems as though it will perform. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: fmrs4282

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. O’Neill makes better one
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. O’Neill makes better one. This stretches out a little in water.
customer_reviews.author: Terri R Haugen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality.. Fits perfectly. I sometimes buy small but this time bought medium and it was the right fit. I bought two others in another brand and they are much lighter weight which is good for every day in sunny weather This one is for swimming.. Seems a little too heavy for every day wear but perfect for swimming. Good price. Fits well. I buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: MadisosnBeau

customer_reviews.title: mine stretched out in only four months.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this shirt when I first got it. Now four months later, the sleeves and body have stretched out making un-useable for my distance swimming. I used it about two to three days a week for four months. I hate having to buy another one but now see if I register it there will be a lifetime guarantee. Wish I had known about that when I bought the first one.
customer_reviews.author: NHwoman

customer_reviews.title: Best buy
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for summer on Lake Michigan. I dislike putting sunscreen all over my body. This shirt helps me reduce how much sunscreen I wear and washes into the beautiful water. It keeps me warmer and more comfortable on both my wave board and SUP. Now my husband wants one.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Lamont

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with the fit
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase from Goddess Rash Guards. Size is as described. I have a large to have a snug fit. Most everyday shirts I wear a medium or large. My second is an extra large, because I wanted a loose fit for other sports, but still water wicking. I'm very pleased with the fit, quality, price, and material. Great job, Goddess Rash Guards!!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Owen

customer_reviews.title: Used it averaging 2-3 times a month for past 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it averaging 2-3 times a month for past 6 months, now it totally lost its elastic, becoming incredibly long any dragging.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I like it. it is cool and light and covers ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it. it is cool and light and covers a lot, but the sizing is disappointing. I purposely ordered an XLarge, though I wear a medium in everything else so that I had a loose fitting shirt. It is still just a tad tighter than I would have hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hackett

customer_reviews.title: Love this shirt
customer_reviews.text: Love this shirt. Nicely made and in the USA. Good quality. I have 2 other rashguard shirts I bought last year from a different company and while I like them, I LOVE this shirt and it was less expensive. I will be buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and definitely kept the sun off me.
customer_reviews.text: It was comfortable and worked very well. Wore it snorkeling every time and loved it.
customer_reviews.author: adp44

customer_reviews.title: Great, size up
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I sized up, I am usually a medium but ordered the large and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy in Florida

customer_reviews.title: FANTADTIC SWIM TOP
customer_reviews.text: This top is made from very substantial, high quality fabric. Fantastic construction. Feels like a second skin. I wear a small or size 6. I ordered the small. Fits like a glove. Highly recommend. Would like to have more colors in the future.
customer_reviews.author: dromig

customer_reviews.title: Quality Comfortable Sun Protection
customer_reviews.text: Amazing comfortable swim shirt . Keeps me cool in hot Florida sun while doing laps..... Sun protection is priority and this product delivers !!! American made quality so refreshing and appreciated! Ordered husband one and sent links to my son-in-law and daughter:)
customer_reviews.author: GK&Z

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage (I'm short and sleeves are a bit long ...
customer_reviews.text: This shirt does exactly what I expected. Great coverage (I'm short and sleeves are a bit long for me, so I cuff them). Fits snugly, but comfortably over my bathing suit. Swimming wearing any shirt takes some getting used to. I think this one is just fine. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing....
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shirt. Just what I was looking for. I bought it for my cruise trip on the Caribbean and I need to protect myself from the sun. Is very comfy and soft.
customer_reviews.author: BeautyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Order up 2 sizes if you aren’t a competitive swimmer ...
customer_reviews.text: Order up 2 sizes if you aren’t a competitive swimmer. I teach swim lessons all summer long. This helps me stay in the water for hours and hours without getting too sunburnt...but make sure to sunscreen your neck!
customer_reviews.author: Devin Cockerille

customer_reviews.title: Great fabric and fit well.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is nice and light, the color is beautiful, and the sizing is spot on. Thank you for mentioning to go up 2 sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really good quality, ordered a size up to make it a little looser, good product!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: I do have a small belly pouch but the fit was good. The feel is light weight and it held ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5' 0 inches, 124 lbs and a size medium fit very well. I do have a small belly pouch but the fit was good. The feel is light weight and it held well in the water without weighing me down. I'm thinking of buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: LMVG

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I was rafting in 55 degree weather. I stayed very comfortable. I purchased a large. That is not my regular size but I have larger shoulders and wanted to be comfortable with the paddle. This worked our great!
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy the sun without sunburn
customer_reviews.text: liked the shirt but wish the material was a bit lighter.shirt does cover shoulder, neck, arms etc. I am satysfied byt wish the material was more similar to the Eddy Bauer cooling effect.
customer_reviews.author: Dori

customer_reviews.title: Good, functional and nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Good, needed a black plain top for a aerial silks prefomance, this one was just about perfect. They could make it a little longer though.
customer_reviews.author: KatP

customer_reviews.title: Good quality swim shirt.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good quality swim shirt. It fits nice and is comfortable. I wanted a shirt for walking so unfortunately it didn't work for me. The fabric felt too hot for morning walks. This is a perfect shirt for swimming though.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Furlong

customer_reviews.title: Love the color, and the durability of the fabric.
customer_reviews.text: The color is as shown, the fabric very strong and soft. I wear a size 8 and usually buy medium in most shirts. This one was too tight so I returned it for a large. I wear it at the lake and when I'm working in the garden.
customer_reviews.author: S. Swartz

customer_reviews.title: Best swim shirt ever
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love it, I live in CA, Pacific Ocean is not too warm, but this keeps me warm in the water and cool outside, it protects my arms and upper body from the sun and wind. it's lightweight and drys quickly in the sun....LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Dobrick

customer_reviews.title: Beauful fabric and fit!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and fabric!!! Fits perfectly it's meant to be snug so you can swim in it but if your chubby or like it loose get a size up! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: lightxxx

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me. I'm 5'6" 140 pounds - a large fits very tight dry but stretches out a bit in the water and give me full freedom of arm movement. I could possibly wear a medium - may try in the future.
customer_reviews.author: JanA

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived on time... true to fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time...true to fit. Fabric was a bit heavier than I expected, but have not used it in the water yet...so the jury is still out!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Not only did it keep me from burning up in ...
customer_reviews.text: Not only did it keep me from burning up in total misery in Bahamas but I also didn't suffer from feeling hot sitting around in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Landsiedel

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm and looks good.....
customer_reviews.text: I love this swim top I can swim even when it’s a little chilly in the morning and afternoons. A must have for a year round swimmer 🏊‍♀️🏊‍♀️🏊‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: lori davidson

customer_reviews.title: ... day after I received it and I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I uses my rash guard the day after I received it and I am very happy with it. The size was a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: SARA

customer_reviews.title: Wife says it fits nice, feels right
customer_reviews.text: Wife says it fits nice, feels right. She wears a M in T-shirts but ordered an XL to have it fit a bit more loosely.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: wears wonderfully.
customer_reviews.text: Sized up to a M for a 5'2", 120 lb woman who typically wears a size small on top. Fits perfectly, wears wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I wear a DDD bra and this covered and still made my waist look good!
customer_reviews.author: ShyAnne

customer_reviews.title: Nice coverage sizing seems a bit small.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear in the summer to block the sun.... definitely not a shirt for the summer it is unbearable in the humidity and heat.
customer_reviews.author: imonly511

customer_reviews.title: it will do the trick. bit larger than i ...
customer_reviews.text: it will do the trick. bit larger than i wanted but it covers me in the sun. have roseca and need to try to not let sun hit my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Momx4

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and really easy to clean! Gunky green stuff from snorkeling comes right out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Although this is a pretty color it runs very very small
customer_reviews.text: Although this is a pretty color it runs very very small. Has to be returned. Beware this costs money to return. Pay attention to sizes.
customer_reviews.author: v

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size up and it's great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size up based on recommendations (XXL when I typically wear XL). Fit very well and was useful for what I purchased it for (snorkeling).
customer_reviews.author: Anne Kyzer

customer_reviews.title: Great product from great company!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, smooth and really protects from the sun! Great for traveling and AMAZING company! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great for pool, hike, everyday wear
customer_reviews.text: Nice, lightweight, awesome fit, no sun burn..... this is my go to for the pool and for a walk!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly G

customer_reviews.title: Great Rash-Guard
customer_reviews.text: Worn under my shorty wetsuit, my arms and neck are protected from the sun. Order a size up if you don't want it feeling like a Spanx. Great color selection.
customer_reviews.author: mae29

customer_reviews.title: Good Material, odd fit
customer_reviews.text: I probably should have sized up from my usual medium. I wish it was a little longer. I was also not a fan of the higher neckline. Missed my return window so I’ll be hanging onto it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Careful of sizes!
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to order AT LEAST two sizes larger than you normally would. The shirt is extremely tight.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for surfing/swimming. It did roll up on the stomach a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Peers

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was advised to buy a size larger. Don't do that. It was too big.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Fuller

customer_reviews.title: SPF sunshirt
customer_reviews.text: Great SPF sunshirt for all outdoor activities. Wash and hang dry
customer_reviews.author: Linda
